title: Ecommerce
description: Build a full-stack e-commerce application  where users can search, filter, and order products. Admins are allowed to CRUD products, users, and categories, with payment integration.

title: Shayogi
description: MERN Stack web application connects service seekers and service providers. Service seekers can search for services, while service providers can create services and request to hire service seekers.

title: Pizza delivery app
description: The Pizza delivery app uses microservices for flexible, scalable, and fault-tolerant operation, facilitating streamlined management of orders, menus, deliveries, and inventory.
